static TerrainIndexBufferPtr get (uint32 quadCountX, uint32 quadCountZ)
 This static method gets a a terrainindexbuffer of certain dimensions from our pool of index buffers, if an index buffer is not in the pool a new one is created.

Detailed Description

This class generates and handles the index buffer for one detail level for the terrain.

It also creates the degenerate triangles used between this lod level and the next lower lod level.

void Terrain::TerrainIndexBuffer::draw ( Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  pMaterial,
const Vector2 &  morphRanges,
const NeighbourMasks &  neighbourMasks,
uint8  subBlockMask 
)

This method draws the triangles using the indexbuffer supplied and an external vertex buffer.

Parameters:
pMaterial Material to render.
morphRanges Morph parameters for the vertex shader.
neighbourMasks Masks representing neighbouring relative LoD differences.
subBlockMask the mask which specifies which sub-blocks to draw. buffer to render.

uint32  quadCountZ 
) [static]

This static method gets a a terrainindexbuffer of certain dimensions from our pool of index buffers, if an index buffer is not in the pool a new one is created.
